# SpritesheetAnimation.Frames property

Gets a read-only collection of the [`SpritesheetFrame`](../SpritesheetFrameType) elements that make up this animation. The order of the frames is from start to the end of the animation.

```csharp
public ReadOnlyCollection<SpritesheetFrame> Frames { get; }
```
